title: Chapter 945 - Dead
body:
Chapter 945 - Dead

Xue He had been killed!

This left Xing Yue wide-eyed and tongue-tied. Wasn’t Su Yi a bit too brazen and domineering?

The other Xing Family experts were astonished too. Even Xing Tianfeng, an Imperial expert, felt his heart quiver.

This was no longer as simple as breaking the rules of Dragon Cloud Arena. Su Yi had effectively declared war with Night Demon Mountain!

And there was no way the older-generation expert Weng Xuanshan would remain uninvolved.

Because Dragon Cloud Arena was Weng Xuanshan’s territory. Su Yi had violated its rules by killing Xue He. This unquestionably crossed Weng Xuanshan’s bottom line!

Wei Jingkui’s expression darkened. He shifted on his feet, appeared on stage out of thin air, and approached Su Yi step by step.

Boom!

Murderous intent surged around him, and the interweaving power of the Laws of Lightning lit up around him, stinging the eyes. The imposing aura of a mid-stage Profound Illumination Emperor was on full display.

“If anyone dares try and stop me from killing this boy, he’ll become the enemy of all of Night Demon Mountain!” Wei Jingkui enunciated each and every word. Murderous intent surged around him.

Xing Tianfeng’s heart clenched, and he was just about to say something when the distant Weng Xuanshan...
